1.Title: SPOCRA Creation Committee Candidate Election
1.Question: Choose 3 candidates for the SPOCRA Creation Committee
1.Description: Each SPO shall select three (3) candidates of their choice.

VoteOptions.Name: John Q. Public
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for John Public because he's the right person for the job!

VoteOptions.Name: Jane Doe
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for Jane Doe to serve on the Creation Committee!

VoteOptions.Name: John Smith
VoteOptions.Description: Vote for John Smith because reasons!
